tag_line: An overhaul of the steering input system for controller and keyboard.
title: Arcade Steering
message:
[B][I]
This is an extensive modification of BeamNG.drive's steering input system for controller and keyboard players.[/I][/B]

[CENTER][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/CGhkVZe.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

The main features include:
[LIST]
[*]Accurate steering limit to utilize the steered wheels' peak grip
[LIST]
[*]This is similar to the [I]Understeer reduction assistant[/I] in 0.26+
[/LIST]
[*]Natural countersteer tendency, simulating the effects of the car's caster angle
[LIST]
[*]This is similar to the [I]Oversteer reduction assistant[/I] in 0.26+
[/LIST]
[*]More refined steering feel compared to the stock assists
[*]Highly customizable settings
[/LIST]
Overall this mod makes the steering tied more closely to the car's underlying physics which makes driving (including drifting or offroading) feel more predictable and fun when playing on controller or keyboard.

The mod includes a UI app called [I]Arcade Steering Settings[/I] which lets you fine tune the steering feel to your liking, although the default settings should be fine for most people.

[CENTER][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/9QktZO0.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

For more info you can check out the project's [URL='https://github.com/adam10603/BeamNG-Arcade-Steering'][B][U]Github page[/U][/B][/URL] which also includes a [URL='https://github.com/adam10603/BeamNG-Arcade-Steering/blob/main/ConfigGuide.md'][B][U]configuration guide[/U][/B][/URL] explaining all the settings, or you can visit the [URL='https://www.beamng.com/threads/arcade-steering-mod.85494/'][B][U]forum thread[/U][/B][/URL] where this mod was first released before being on the mod repository.

Have fun!
